response.overview: In a certain village, a little girl was killed inexplicably. The murderer was a homeless man with a mental disorder. In the face of unexplained disaster, the family of four did not choose to accept it. They calculated a plan of revenge on their own and implemented it.
response.tagline: In a certain village, a little girl was killed inexplicably. The murderer was a homeless man with a mental disorder. In the face of unexplained disaster, the family of four did not choose to accept it.
response.title: The Revengers Family
